### Inputs:

## Files
"run_analysis.R" - the analysis R script used to load, merge and tidy the data availble in the data folder

### Outputs:
"AssignmentSubmission.txt" - the submitted assignment dataset 

## Data from:
"CodeBook.Rmd" - Apapted code book for assignment
https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/getdata%2Fprojectfiles%2FUCI%20HAR%20Dataset.zip http://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Human+Activity+Recognition+Using+Smartphones 



## Steps to run code
1. Compile code in run_analysis.R file. To do this is RStudio - highlight all code in the run_analyis.R file and select "Run"
2. In the console issue command Write(run_analysis()). This will result to "AssignmentSubmission.txt" being created
